H0.text: To whom is Gwyneth Paltrow married. Chris Martin

H1.text: To whom is Gwyneth Paltrow married. Brad Pitt

H2.text: To whom is Gwyneth Paltrow married. Ben Affleck

H3.text: To whom is Gwyneth Paltrow married. Moses Martin

A4.text: They married on December 5, 2003, at the Santa Barbara County Courthouse.

A5.text: They called off the engagement because she was not ready for marriage.
